org.apparatus_templi

Class MessageCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apparatus_templi.MessageCenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class MessageCenter
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Singleton pattern that handles message fragmentation and de-fragmentation. Sends completed fragments to the serial connection and reads incoming bytes from the serial line, reassembling completed message fragments, and combines fragments into completed messages before placing them in a queue for higher-level processing.
    Author:
    Jonathan Nelson

              throws InterruptedException,

      • sendCommand

        boolean sendCommand(String moduleName,
                  String command)
        Generates a complete Message from the given command addressed to the specified module, then sends the Message to the serial connection. If the Message generated is too large for a single transmission then it will automatically be broken into as many fragments as needed before transmission.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - the name of the module that this message should be sent to.
        command - the text data to send to the module
        Returns:
        true if the message was sent, false otherwise.

      • sendBinary

        boolean sendBinary(String moduleName,
                 byte[] data)
        Generates a complete Message from the given command addressed to the specified module, then sends the Message to the serial connection. If the Message generated is too large for a single transmission then it will automatically be broken into as many fragments as needed before transmission.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - the name of the module that this message should be sent to.
        data - the binary data to send to the module
        Returns:
        true if the message was sent, false otherwise.

      • readBytesUntil

        byte[] readBytesUntil(byte termByte)
                throws InterruptedException
        Read bytes from the serial connection a byte matching termByte is found. This method may block indefinitely.
        Parameters:
        termByte - the byte to watch for.
        Returns:
        an array of bytes read up to (but not including) the term byte
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • isSerialConnected

        boolean isSerialConnected()
        Returns true if the serial connection is ready, false otherwise.
        Returns:

        Sets the serial connection of MessageCenter to the given serialConnection.
        Parameters:
        newSerialConnection -

      • run

        public void run()
        Run in a constant loop checking for messages in the byte buffer. If the byte buffer has at least 15 bytes and the first byte is a valid start byte then execution will block until a valid message is read.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
